projectile.description: If set, the check will only pass if the projectile was of an entity type with the specified namespace and ID.
projectile.markdownDescription: If set, the check will only pass if the projectile was of an entity type with the specified namespace and ID.

projectile_condition.description: If set, the check will only pass if the projectile entity fulfills this condition.
projectile_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the check will only pass if the projectile entity fulfills this condition.
